classmethod is_candidate_function(app, candidate)[source]¶

Semantic filtering based on disassembly, using only the gadget category, but no information like register assignments or concrete variable values.

Parameters:
  • app – Parent angr project
  • candidate – A candidate gadget
Returns:

True if gadget is valid gadget for this category
Return type:

bool
classmethod is_candidate_gadget(app, candidate, call)[source]¶

Semantic filtering based on disassembly, using information that is only known at runtime like register assignments.

Parameters:
  • app – Parent angr project
  • candidate – A candidate gadget
  • call – The concrete gadget
Returns:

True if gadget is valid gadget for this category
Return type:

bool

simulate(state)[source]¶

Simulates a state until the exit condition is met

Parameters:state – State to simulate
Returns:List of valid resulting states
Return type:list
autocoop.esl_lib.execute.gadget¶

autocoop.esl_lib.mainloop module¶

autocoop.esl_lib.mainloop.generate_main(app, config, calltargets_order)[source]¶

Generates the object dispatch loop gadget and the array builder.

The the offsets for the object array ptr and the object array length are generated by stepping though the disassembled code, from the virtual function call/the loop exit condition, tracking the relevant registers until the offset is found.

Parameters:
  • app (angr.Project) – application the gadget will be found for
  • config (Config) – configuration of the exploit generator
  • calltargets_order (list[int]) – list of calltargets in the order they are called in
Returns:

Array builder object ready for more objects to be added and vptr offset
autocoop.esl_lib.mainloop.update_main(array_builder, calltargets)[source]¶

Adds objects to array builder

Parameters:
  • array_builder – Array builder to add objects to
  • calltargets (list) – list of calltargets and builder objects
